titles.title: Armed Forces Tax Relief Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude combat zone compensation of members of the Armed Forces from employment taxes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E371)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
2/15/2007--Introduced.
Armed Forces Tax Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from employment taxes combat zone compensation of members of the Armed Forces which is excludable from gross income. Appropriates amounts to cover Social Security trust fund deficits resulting from such tax exemption.
